[vc_row equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”1″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ bg_position=”center center” css=”.vc_custom_1601387711498{padding-top: 200px !important;padding-bottom: 300px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/About-Us-2.jpg?id=11151) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” ca_init_translate_x=”1″ ca_init_translate_y=”-53″ ca_delay=”300″ el_id=”header-area” row_hide=”hidden-xs”][vc_column width=”1/2″]

About Us

Putting enterprise-class cybersecurity services within reach of every organisation.

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ align=”text-center”] Get in touch [vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”1″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ bg_position=”right center” css=”.vc_custom_1600963735981{padding-top: 120px !important;padding-bottom: 300px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/About-us-phone.jpg?id=9467) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” ca_init_translate_x=”1″ ca_init_translate_y=”-53″ ca_delay=”300″ row_hide=”hidden-sm hidden-md hidden-lg”][vc_column width=”1/2″]

About Us

Putting enterprise-class
cybersecurity services within
reach of every organisation.

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ align=”text-center”] Get in touch [vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_height=”yes” bg_position=”center bottom” css=”.vc_custom_1653902553615{padding-top: 75px !important;padding-bottom: 75px !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column width=”2/3″ enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”0″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ align=”text-center” offset=”vc_col-sm-offset-2″ ca_init_translate_y=”50″][vc_empty_space height=”36px” el_class=”mobile-hidden”][vc_column_text]

In 2014, the Falanx Group formed Falanx Cyber Defence Ltd, solely to provide class-leading cyber security services and solutions. We deliver end-to-end cyber capabilities, either as specific engagements or as fully-managed services. Our capabilities comprise a full suite of cyber security services, all focussed on improving our clients’ cyber resilience, and ultimately enabling them to withstand, cyber-attacks.

Currently, Falanx Cyber operates from the U.K. with our headquarters and Security Operations Centre based in Reading. As a provider of cyber security services, we are focussed on delivering those services to the highest standards of client satisfaction possible. We believe that by focussing on our core business our clients benefit from levels of agility, expertise, and quality that wouldn’t be delivered from larger, generalist, service providers and consultancy houses, to whom cyber security is viewed as a supplementary revenue stream.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”36px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1600267779858{padding-bottom: 0px !important;background-color: #122135 !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”o2c-white-text”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1591104586381{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;}”]

Our timeline

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1600267652081{background-color: #122135 !important;}” el_class=”o2c-white-text”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1600268127137{margin-bottom: 20px !important;border-top-width: 1px !important;border-right-width: 1px !important;border-bottom-width: 1px !important;border-left-width: 1px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;border-left-color: #f7af17 !important;border-left-style: solid !important;border-right-color: #f7af17 !important;border-right-style: solid !important;border-top-color: #f7af17 !important;border-top-style: solid !important;border-bottom-color: #f7af17 !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}”]
[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1646231285282{margin-bottom: 50px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;}”]

Falanx Cyber is part of Falanx Group, an AIM listed company.

A full list of investor resources can be found here.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1600267623184{padding-bottom: 20px !important;background-color: #122135 !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”o2c-white-text”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1600267248777{border-top-width: 1px !important;border-right-width: 1px !important;border-bottom-width: 1px !important;border-left-width: 1px !important;padding-top: 30px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;border-left-color: #ffffff !important;border-left-style: solid !important;border-right-color: #ffffff !important;border-right-style: solid !important;border-top-color: #ffffff !important;border-top-style: solid !important;border-bottom-color: #ffffff !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}”]

2021

f:CEL (falanx cyber exposure level) launched.

 

Organisation certified to ISO 27001, ISO 9001, and ISO 20000

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1600267623184{padding-bottom: 20px !important;background-color: #122135 !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”o2c-white-text”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1600267248777{border-top-width: 1px !important;border-right-width: 1px !important;border-bottom-width: 1px !important;border-left-width: 1px !important;padding-top: 30px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;border-left-color: #ffffff !important;border-left-style: solid !important;border-right-color: #ffffff !important;border-right-style: solid !important;border-top-color: #ffffff !important;border-top-style: solid !important;border-bottom-color: #ffffff !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}”]
2020

Managed Detection & Response service launched.

Fully-managed Endpoint Detection & Response service launched.

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1600267623184{padding-bottom: 20px !important;background-color: #122135 !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”o2c-white-text”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1600940696802{margin-top: 30px !important;border-top-width: 1px !important;border-right-width: 1px !important;border-bottom-width: 1px !important;border-left-width: 1px !important;padding-top: 30px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 93px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;border-left-color: #ffffff !important;border-left-style: solid !important;border-right-color: #ffffff !important;border-right-style: solid !important;border-top-color: #ffffff !important;border-top-style: solid !important;border-bottom-color: #ffffff !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}” responsive_css=”margin_top_large:0px|border_top_large:1px|border_right_large:1px|border_bottom_large:1px|border_left_large:1px|padding_top_large:30px|padding_right_large:30px|padding_bottom_large:93px|padding_left_large:30px|margin_top_medium:0px|border_top_medium:1px|border_right_medium:1px|border_bottom_medium:1px|border_left_medium:1px|padding_top_medium:30px|padding_right_medium:30px|padding_bottom_medium:93px|padding_left_medium:30px|margin_top_small:0px|border_top_small:1px|border_right_small:1px|border_bottom_small:1px|border_left_small:1px|padding_top_small:30px|padding_right_small:30px|padding_bottom_small:93px|padding_left_small:30px”]
2019

SOC relocated to larger premises at The Blade in Reading.

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1601647249874{padding-bottom: 35px !important;background-color: #122135 !important;border-radius: 2px !important;}” el_class=”o2c-white-text”][vc_column enable_overlay=”yes” el_class=”middle-row” responsive_css=”margin_top_large:0px|margin_bottom_large:0px|border_top_large:1px|border_right_large:1px|border_bottom_large:1px|border_left_large:1px|padding_top_large:30px|padding_right_large:30px|padding_bottom_large:58px|padding_left_large:30px|margin_top_medium:0px|margin_bottom_medium:30px|border_top_medium:1px|border_right_medium:1px|border_bottom_medium:1px|border_left_medium:1px|padding_top_medium:30px|padding_right_medium:30px|padding_bottom_medium:30px|padding_left_medium:30px|margin_top_small:0px|border_top_small:1px|border_right_small:1px|border_bottom_small:1px|border_left_small:1px|padding_top_small:30px|padding_right_small:30px|padding_bottom_small:60px|padding_left_small:30px” css=”.vc_custom_1600942377741{margin-top: 10px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;border-top-width: 1px !important;border-right-width: 1px !important;border-bottom-width: 1px !important;border-left-width: 1px !important;padding-top: 30px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 58px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;border-left-color: #ffffff !important;border-left-style: solid !important;border-right-color: #ffffff !important;border-right-style: solid !important;border-top-color: #ffffff !important;border-top-style: solid !important;border-bottom-color: #ffffff !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}”]
2018

Acquires First Base Technologies, bolstering penetration testing capabilities and organisational reach.

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1601647249874{padding-bottom: 35px !important;background-color: #122135 !important;border-radius: 2px !important;}” el_class=”o2c-white-text”][vc_column el_class=”middle-row” responsive_css=”margin_bottom_large:0px|padding_bottom_large:114px|margin_bottom_medium:30px|border_top_medium:1px|border_right_medium:1px|border_bottom_medium:1px|border_left_medium:1px|padding_top_medium:30px|padding_right_medium:30px|padding_bottom_medium:60px|padding_left_medium:30px|border_top_small:1px|border_right_small:1px|border_bottom_small:1px|border_left_small:1px|padding_top_small:30px|padding_right_small:30px|padding_bottom_small:115px|padding_left_small:30px” css=”.vc_custom_1601647601346{margin-bottom: 50px !important;border-top-width: 1px !important;border-right-width: 1px !important;border-bottom-width: 1px !important;border-left-width: 1px !important;padding-top: 30px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 114px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;border-left-color: #ffffff !important;border-left-style: solid !important;border-right-color: #ffffff !important;border-right-style: solid !important;border-top-color: #ffffff !important;border-top-style: solid !important;border-bottom-color: #ffffff !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}”]
2017

Penetration testing services are certified to CREST.

Acquires AuditSec Services Limited.

SOC moves to Birmingham.

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1601647249874{padding-bottom: 35px !important;background-color: #122135 !important;border-radius: 2px !important;}” el_class=”o2c-white-text”][vc_column el_class=”middle-row” responsive_css=”margin_bottom_large:0px|border_top_large:1px|border_right_large:1px|border_bottom_large:1px|border_left_large:1px|padding_top_large:30px|padding_right_large:30px|padding_bottom_large:30px|padding_left_large:30px|margin_bottom_medium:30px|padding_bottom_medium:30px|margin_top_small:0px|padding_bottom_small:30px” css=”.vc_custom_1601647957331{margin-top: -20px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;border-top-width: 1px !important;border-right-width: 1px !important;border-bottom-width: 1px !important;border-left-width: 1px !important;padding-top: 30px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;border-left-color: #ffffff !important;border-left-style: solid !important;border-right-color: #ffffff !important;border-right-style: solid !important;border-top-color: #ffffff !important;border-top-style: solid !important;border-bottom-color: #ffffff !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}”]
2016

Name changes to Falanx Cyber Defence Limited.

Acquires consultancy-house, JustASC.

Penetration testing and consultancy services become part of the service portfolio.

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1601647249874{padding-bottom: 35px !important;background-color: #122135 !important;border-radius: 2px !important;}” el_class=”o2c-white-text”][vc_column el_class=”bottom-row” responsive_css=”margin_bottom_large:0px|margin_top_medium:0px|margin_bottom_medium:30px|margin_top_small:-30px|margin_bottom_small:30px” css=”.vc_custom_1601647922096{margin-bottom: 30px !important;border-top-width: 1px !important;border-right-width: 1px !important;border-bottom-width: 1px !important;border-left-width: 1px !important;padding-top: 30px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;border-left-color: #ffffff !important;border-left-style: solid !important;border-right-color: #ffffff !important;border-right-style: solid !important;border-top-color: #ffffff !important;border-top-style: solid !important;border-bottom-color: #ffffff !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}”]
2015

First UK-based SOC is opened in Reading, Green Park and protective monitoring services are delivered.

Organisation certified to ISO 27001, ISO 9001, and ISO 20000

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1601647249874{padding-bottom: 35px !important;background-color: #122135 !important;border-radius: 2px !important;}” el_class=”o2c-white-text”][vc_column el_class=”bottom-row” responsive_css=”margin_bottom_large:0px|margin_top_medium:0px|margin_bottom_medium:30px|margin_top_small:-30px|margin_bottom_small:30px” css=”.vc_custom_1601647922096{margin-bottom: 30px !important;border-top-width: 1px !important;border-right-width: 1px !important;border-bottom-width: 1px !important;border-left-width: 1px !important;padding-top: 30px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;border-left-color: #ffffff !important;border-left-style: solid !important;border-right-color: #ffffff !important;border-right-style: solid !important;border-top-color: #ffffff !important;border-top-style: solid !important;border-bottom-color: #ffffff !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}”]
2014

Company founded as Falanx Assuria.

Falanx Assuria is launched on the Alternative Investment Market (AIM).

[/vc_column][/vc_row]
